metadata.title: CVE-2021-45944 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Ghostscript GhostPDL 9.50 through 9.53.3 has a use-after-free insampled_data_sample (called from sampled_data_continue and interp).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.5
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.5
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.5
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.5').
